channel.title: Custom Sidebar Tab/Interface
channel.description: I'm attempting to add a new tab to my server and I want a custom interface. mainly I want it to just be text in the interface but I havent been able to get it work. I have edited my quest tab in client .java but it doesnt seem to be working the same. I've read lots of tutorials and they are saying to declare the interface in RSinterface.java but my server doesnt have that. where else would it go?

item.title: Custom Sidebar Tab/Interface
item.dc:creator: @veraflows veraflows
item.description:
@veraflows wrote:

rmark45matsu:

If your working with old school delta, I can help you. It’s the only revision that I’ve added interfaces to.

I am for sure in need. this is not working for me.

Read full topic

I’m attempting to add a new tab to my server and I want a custom interface. mainly I want it to just be text in the interface but I havent been able to get it work.
